About

My name is Aiden and I am in 1B Software Engineering at the University of Waterloo. I like to solve cool problems with code, but who doesn't nowadays?

When I'm not programming I'm probably on reddit. Actually even if I'm programming I'm probably on reddit. If I'm not there I'm probably on the corner of King and Victoria picking up invertible matrices.

This is where I post the things I'm working on (or the things I'm working on to avoid actually working on things).

Contact me by email. You can also find me on github.

Orbit Assistant
Oct 25, 2016

A portable personal assistance built using the TI Tiva and Orbit Booster Pack. Made for our SE101 final project. Check it out here


Matrix Utils
Oct 20, 2016

A matrix solver, inverter and determinant calculator written in with Javascript. Try it here


Diamond Square
Mar 21, 2016

An implementation of the diamond square algorithm, commonly used for creating realistic landscape and smooth heightmaps.


Frc 4334 Robotcode
Mar 2, 2016

The code used to power Team 4334's FRC Robot for the 2016 game FIRST Stronghold. Check out our blue alliance page here


Vex Nothing But Net
Mar 2, 2016

The code used to power our 2016 Nothing But Net robot.


Neural Net For Ocr
Jan 12, 2016

Segments and reads images of printed text to using neural networks.


Gravity Sim
Nov 21, 2015

A graphical simulation of stellar bodies written in Java.


Tetris
Oct 24, 2015

A simple tetris clone written in java.
